description:
This proof records a real-life moment of subsistence labor at MaMeeFarm on
22 December 2025 at 11:19 AM (GMT+7).

The image captures MaMee starting a wood-fired stove to prepare for cooking rice â€” even before the rice itself has been readied. The delay is not accidental; it reflects a common reality of small-scale farming life, where physical labor often takes priority over meals.

The firewood stove, reused materials, and manual ignition represent a non-industrial, off-grid daily routine. Cooking here is not convenience-based, but time-dependent and effort-bound. The act of lighting the fire becomes part of the labor record itself.

This proof highlights an often invisible truth:

Food preparation is also labor â€” especially when survival work comes first.

No staging. No optimization.
Only real work, real time, real constraints â€” preserved as ground-truth data.

This record is part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
